column4: anyone know how to get blacklight retrubution working in wine?
I think http://www.winehq.org might be a better help :)

http://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=application&iId=13983 - You might want to run winetricks before you install the game. apt-get install winetricks. Use it for installing directX and Visual C runtime
so use the winetricks direct x and visual c instead of what comes with the game?
Never tried the game, I just give the advice from past experience
ok thanks what is winetricks exactly? like a front end for wine like playonlinux?
Similar, yes, a bit older, and more limited, but helps sometimes
ok thanks hopefully wine will make a big breakthrough sometime soon to hel alot of ppl like me haha
It already went a great way, you couldn't imagine how hard it was before 1.0 :)
you have a good point :) is it always best to sue the latiest dev version of wine?
But works ok for me more often
ok thanks if i can get some of my games working on ubuntu i would gladly get rid of my windows partision
Like earlier, before 1.3 I couldn't run Heroes of Might and Magic III with directX+Wine through network, now it works great
HoMM3? No, I had to install DirectX for DirectPlay8 with winetricks and then it started working.
